summary:
Retextures Nightingale Armor to brown version, with  nightingale symbols on it. 
This way it fits thieves guild a bit more.
descriptionHtml:
This is new texture for Nightingale Armor. It adds nightingale symbols to it and recolours it to brown version. This way it may fit a bit more into thieves guild. 
- If you do not want to do all the thieves guild quests to get the armor, you can obtain it in Whiterun, Hall of Dead, at the end of the corridor.

Installation:
Extract all files to your skyrim data directory.  Example of \"Data\" directory location: \\Program Files\\Tes V - Skyrim\\Data

File version:
This is normal version of the armor v1.00, higher resolution armor will be added shortly.

Unintallation:
Delete mod textures and plug-in file.

I hope you\'ll enjoy wearing this armor. :D
author: iiwemm
